news.title: MayKay announces debut solo single 'Busted'
news.summary: "It’s been a long time coming!" said MayKay.

news.title: Electric Picnic 2025: Salty Dog line-up revealed, featuring Aslan, DUG, SexyTadhg and more
news.summary: Mik Pyro, The Fynches, Tebi Rex, and Really Good Time are also set to play the legendary shipwreck stage at this year's festival

news.title: David Keenan announces Irish tour dates
news.summary: The Dundalk native is set to play various dates across the country, including Dingle, Ballina, Wicklow and Kilkenny.

news.title: Noel Gallagher in '11: "The first two Oasis albums were a complete and utter dictatorship, and they’re the best records we ever made"
news.summary: Ahead of Oasis’s sold-out Croke Park shows on August 16 & 17, we’re taking a deep-dive into the Hot Press archives – to hear Liam and Noel's incredible story in their own words...

news.title: Minister for Culture announces €10 million in funding for public interest journalism
news.summary: €6 million is allocated for Round 2 of the Local Democracy and Courts Reporting Schemes, with the remaining €4 million funding the introduction of a News Reporting Scheme.

news.title: In the new issue: Hozier graces the cover of our Electric Picnic Special
news.summary: The Electric Picnic Special Issue of Hot Press is out now. Hozier, KNEECAP, For Those I Love, Orla Gartland, NOFUN! and Delush all feature.

news.title: Rainbow Kitten Surprise announce Dublin show
news.summary: They will play in the National Stadium on June 2, 2026.

news.title: FILM OF THE WEEK: Materialists - Reviewed by Roe McDermott
news.summary: Love and capitalism are explored in Celine Song's romantic drama, but there's much more sharpness and style than soul here.

news.title: Album Review: Tom Grennan, Everywhere I Went, Led Me To Where I Didn’t Want to Be
news.summary: UK pop star flaunts bold new sound. 8/10
